feature.label: org.codehaus.aspectwerkz.ide.eclipse.feature
feature.description: AspectWerkz AOP Eclipse Plugin - Embedded Java 1.4 Annotation compiler - Embedded weaving - Cross-cutting view through markers on weaved classes - Launch configuration for load time weaving
